Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: â€¢ Attention people! It's tax time in Australia and millions of Aussies are feeling the burn with a $1500 tax increase by stealth. Eligible taxpayers are now missing out on the low and middle-income offset of $1080 which is prompting increased support from the May federal budget. And while vaccination is becoming the buzzword post-Covid, companies, in the meantime, are promoting the idea of offering flu jabs as a way to keep workers healthy and maintain work productivity. Let's keep our sleeves rolled up and keep business running!
